description.value: You overwhelm your target’s programming, installing a dangerous self-replicating programming virus. This works like a physical or mental @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{Disease} (your choice), except it ignores the target’s immunity to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{Diseases}. The programming virus has a frequency of 1 hour and requires two consecutive saving throws to cure. Detect affliction can reveal the existence of this virus in a construct (the virus is considered a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{Disease} for purposes of that spell). Additionally, remove affliction can remove this virus.

target.value: one construct with the technological subtype
